text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the ASUS FX503VD-EH73 15.6” FHD Powerful Gaming Laptop, Intel Core i7-7700HQ Quad-Core 2.8GHz Processor, GTX 1050 4GB, 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD, 8GB DDR4, Windows 10 Home is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS FX503VD-EH73 15.6” FHD Powerful Gaming Laptop, Intel Core i7-7700HQ Quad-Core 2.8GHz Processor, GTX 1050 4GB, 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD, 8GB DDR4, Windows 10 Home!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
